rsda is a design archive with a special focus on nineteenth century Portuguese graphic design and illustration. Maintained by Ricardo Santos.

Brasil - alguns apontamentos

Authors Manuel Motta Cardoso
Oskar
Year 1961
Origin Brazil
Tagged Brazil non-fiction tourism commerce government illustration
Type book
Reference RS.040.0007

About

Published by the Brazilian government’s «office of propaganda and commercial expansion in Lisbon», the book goes through the history, demographics, economy, and culture of the country.
